mapper.update: update inno72_machine_connection_msg set status = 1,update_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where machine_code='${machineCode}' and activity_id='${activityId}' and type=${type} and version=${version} and status = 0

update inno72_machine_connection_msg set status = 3,update_time=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() where machine_code='${machineCode}' and activity_id='${activityId}' and type=${type} and version < ${version} and status = 0
mapper.select: select * from inno72_machine_connection_msg m where m.`status`= 0
select * from inno72_machine_connection_msg m where m.`status`= 0 and m.type=${type}
mapper.update: update inno72_machine_connection_msg set times=${times} where id='${id}'
